channel.title: Combiler Error HELP!

item.title: Combiler Error HELP!
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Replace it with this:

[code=Java]if (command.startsWith(“message”)) {
if (command.length() < 8) {
sM(“You’re message is too short!”);
return;
}
String Title = "[Player] ";
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“weed”))
Title = "[Owner] “+playerName+”: ";
if (playerRights == 3 && !c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“weed”))
Title = "[Co-Owner] “+playerName+”: ";
if (playerRights == 2)
Title = "[Admin] “+playerName+”: ";
if (playerRights == 1)
Title = "[Moderator] “+playerName+”: ";

yell(Title + playerName + ": " + command.substring(8));

}[/code][/quote]
Just the person I was waiting for.
Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Combiler Error HELP!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I Vain I:

You said to change it to >= 8, but that has nothing to do with the ‘ge’ it was yelling the message substring at character(5) which would be the ‘a’ is message. That said, the GE would be yelled before your message. I also fixed the conventions a bit.

Mmk, i see what your saying. thanks for clarifying even though this wasn’t my topic

Read full topic

item.title: Combiler Error HELP!
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

client.java:9441: break outside switch or loop break; ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Last command i entered was ::message command but idk if thats the problem

::message command:

if (command.startsWith("message")) { if (command.length() >= 6) { sM("You're message is too short!"); break; } String Title = "[Player] "; if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("weed")) Title = "[Owner] "+playerName+": "; if (playerRights == 3) Title = "[Co-Owner] "+playerName+": "; if (playerRights == 2) Title = "[Admin] "+playerName+": "; if (playerRights == 1) Title = "[Moderator] "+playerName+": "; yell(Title + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

info:
317
delta
loader: Blurrs
